com.erikartymiuk.badbudgetlogic.main

Interface Source

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Account, CreditCard, SavingsAccount

    public interface Source
    A source can be used to pay for losses. Depending on the class implementing this it could either reduce a positive balance (a checking account) or potentially increase a negative one (a credit card)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String name()
      A source should be able to tells us a unique description of itself (its name).
      void predictLossForDayIndex(java.lang.String destinationDescription, double lossAmount, boolean addBack, double addBackAmount, int dayIndex)
      A source needs to have funds or credit available so it can have money pulled from it for whatever purpose the funds are needed.

    • Method Detail

      • predictLossForDayIndex

        void predictLossForDayIndex(java.lang.String destinationDescription,
                            double lossAmount,
                            boolean addBack,
                            double addBackAmount,
                            int dayIndex)
        A source needs to have funds or credit available so it can have money pulled from it for whatever purpose the funds are needed. This is the predict loss implementation for use with the prediction algorithm. It processes the loss for this source by updating its prediction rows appropriately (i.e. removing or adding to the sources funds or credit). This method should also be capable of handling an add back to the source.
        Parameters:
        destinationDescription - - a string description of what the funds are being used for. Used for the transaction history
        lossAmount - - the amount of funds needed
        addBack - - true if the destination is a budget item and that budget item has funds to add back to the source
        addBackAmount - - the amount to add back to the source (if applicable)
        dayIndex - - the date as an index or offset from prediction start date

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        A source should be able to tells us a unique description of itself (its name).
        Returns:
        this source's unique name
